attributes.action: Create an English parliament similar to the welsh and Scottish parliament
attributes.additional_details:
It seems the Scottish and welsh parliaments can have a say on what England and Britain can do but England can not have a vote on Scotland and Wales 
Keeping these parliaments like this is more than likely costing English tax payers 
we should be either one parliament or all seperate
attributes.background: Create a separate English parliament where the English nation can make its own decisions like the Welsh and Scottish parliaments do

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/556380
